dart.code: import 'package:test/test.dart'; // Function to calculate nth kynea number int nthKyneaNumber(int n) { // Calculate nth kynea number // using formula ((2^n + 1)^2 ) -2 // Firstly calculate 2^n + 1 n = (1 << n) + 1; // Now calculate (2^n + 1)^2 n = n * n; // Now calculate ((2^n + 1)^2 ) - 2 n = n - 2; // return nth Kynea number return n; } // Driver Program void main() { test("1th Kynea number equals to 7", () { expect(nthKyneaNumber(1), equals(7)); }); test("4th Kynea number equals to 287", () { expect(nthKyneaNumber(4), equals(287)); }); test("6th Kynea number equals to 4223", () { expect(nthKyneaNumber(6), equals(4223)); }); test("10th Kynea number equals to 1050623", () { expect(nthKyneaNumber(10), equals(1050623)); }); }
